channel.title: Glitched Partyhat and Invisible body with cape (items that sit on your head)
channel.description: When you wear certain capes with items that sit on your head like a partyhat it looks like this: [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/55584635/glitchedpartyhat.bmp[/img] and when i wear this donator cape it makes my body invisible pic: [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/55584635/donatorcapeglitched.bmp[/img]

item.title: Glitched Partyhat and Invisible body with cape (items that sit on your head)
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:527797”]The invis is because your model header is reading the cape as top priority. So it shows the cape over everything.

The hat is because you don’t have it defined properly in the server (Your blue one looks fine…)[/quote]

  1. How would I fix that though?
  2. No the blue one isn’t fine if I wear capes like the fire cape my partyhat\santa or items that sit on your head will look like that it won’t be messed up if you wear a skillcape though. I’m wearing the donator cape and it’s similar to a skillcape so my hat’s fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Glitched Partyhat and Invisible body with cape (items that sit on your head)

item.title: Glitched Partyhat and Invisible body with cape (items that sit on your head)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The invis is because your model header is reading the cape as top priority. So it shows the cape over everything.

The hat is because you don’t have it defined properly in the server (Your blue one looks fine…)

Read full topic
